Title: Scamps
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Kent Osborne, Somvilay Xayaphone, Kent Osborne (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Dylan Haggerty (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Hynden Walch, Ava Acres
Plot: A King's Ransom: Ice King suffers a heartbreaking loss and it's up to Finn and Jake to find the culprit. / Scamps: Finn takes a group of at-risk Candy Kingdom youth on a camping trip they'll never forget.
